field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the client config.

field.label: Secret
field.help: Set the shared secret for the client. Must match on both sides.

field.label: IP Address or Network with CIDR
field.help: Set the IP address of the remote client or the complete network like 10.10.10.0/24

field.label: Require Message-Authenticator
field.help: RFC 5080 suggests that all clients should include it in an Access-Request. If the server requires it (option checked) and the client does not, then the packet will be silently discarded.
